justification: Rationale centers only on Team A’s floor and ignores Team B’s conservative, stability-seeking mindset. It asks B to give up Campbell (low variance, possession traits) for Baker (high variance), which clashes with B’s preferences and urgent need for reliable points. It also mislabels Turner as a TE upgrade over Adams (likely a downgrade for A). While B does receive a TE upgrade (Adams) and a buy‑low RB (White), these points aren’t argued and don’t clearly offset losing Campbell’s stability.
